titleStmt.title: The strange fortunes of two excellent princes in their liues and loues, to their equall ladies in all titles of true honour.
titleStmt.author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?

publicationStmt.publisher: By P. Short, for Nicholas Ling,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The historie of two princes, Fantiro and Penillo.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
